title: 求教nbt指令
author: xiaoyuan233
txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:flint_and_steel 1 0 {display:{Lore:["第一行","第二行","第三行"]}}

这个指令怎么给name和lore信息添加颜色？

1.11.2的版本

大神求教

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
牌子强更法（http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-580483-1-1.html）
可套用示例更改：/setblock ~ ~1 ~ standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{"text":"右键点击我","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/give @p minecraft:paper 1 0 {display:{Name:\\"\\u00A7a我是物品名\\",Lore:[0:\\"\\u00A76我是第一行\\",1:\\"\\u00A76我是第二行\\",2:\\"\\u00A76我是第三行\\",]}}"}}",Text2:"{"text":"Ctrl+鼠标中键可复制"}}",Text3:"",Text4:""} 复制代码样式代码点我至于tellraw 加个"color":""就好了
/tellraw @a {"text":"红色","color":"red","extra":[{"text":"【","color":"green","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":""}}]}复制代码

replies.author: xiaoyuan233
replies.txt_content:
tellraw @a {"text":"","extra":[{"text":"【","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":""}}]}
